## Microcovid scenarios

10,000 microcovids is a 1% risk of getting covid per instance (per trip to the grocery store per person). This is a very rough estimate.

* [Grocery shopping](https://www.microcovid.org/?distance=sixFt&duration=60&interaction=oneTime&personCount=5&riskBudget=1000&riskProfile=average&scenarioName=60minShopping&setting=indoor&subLocation=US_25017&theirMask=basic&topLocation=US_25&voice=normal&yourMask=n95&yourVaccineDoses=2&yourVaccineType=pfizer)
* [Plane flight](https://www.microcovid.org/?distance=sixFt&duration=360&interaction=oneTime&personCount=41&riskBudget=1000&riskProfile=average&scenarioName=planeRide&setting=plane&subLocation=US_25017&theirMask=basic&topLocation=US_25&voice=silent&yourMask=n95&yourVaccineDoses=2&yourVaccineType=pfizer)
* [Eating in a restaurant indoors](https://www.microcovid.org/?distance=sixFt&duration=90&interaction=oneTime&personCount=15&riskBudget=1000&riskProfile=average&scenarioName=restaurantIndoors&setting=indoor&subLocation=US_25017&theirMask=none&topLocation=US_25&voice=normal&yourMask=none&yourVaccineDoses=2&yourVaccineType=pfizer)
* [Eating at a restaurant outdoors](https://www.microcovid.org/?distance=sixFt&duration=90&interaction=oneTime&personCount=15&riskBudget=1000&riskProfile=average&scenarioName=restaurantOutdoors&setting=outdoor&subLocation=US_25017&theirMask=none&topLocation=US_25&voice=normal&yourMask=none&yourVaccineDoses=2&yourVaccineType=pfizer)
